recommendations: ‚ÄúMeeting Arjun was a turning point in my career, a moment that reshaped my path. His leadership challenged me to push beyond my comfort zone and unlock potential I didn‚Äôt know I had.Arjun encouraged me to think like a business owner, empowering me to take bold, independent actions and own my journey. What truly sets him apart is his ability to celebrate even the smallest wins, turning every effort into a moment of growth and motivation. His strategic insight and unwavering commitment to excellence create a motivating environment that inspires everyone around him.His strategic insight and ability to keep the team motivated led to a successful outcome, exceeding targets and boosting morale. I wholeheartedly recommend Arjun as a dynamic leader. His exceptional ability to inspire and his commitment to success will undoubtedly make a lasting impact wherever he goes.‚Äù Show less

‚ÄúArjun - where do I start with him? Social Media Hero, Star Business Dev Leader, Doting dad and husband, Aspiring Life & Financial coach, A Sounding Board for me....the list can go on and on. But sticking to work, I was privileged to have probably one of the best Business Development counterpart any marketer can have. I was so luck to have his proactiveness, his research skills, his email copy style, his aggressive yet non pushy sales approach and quick response/updates to any marketing tasks assigned. Together, we formed one hell of an inbound+ outbound engine, improving response times for inbound leads resulting in better conversions. What's more is that he'd go beyond the role to help us distribute content, invite people to participate in content and get speakers. Our event outcomes also soared with his collaboration. To future employers, he's one pick that you should always consider to lead if you are building a strategic proactive BD team that actually goes beyond their role (not just a reactive inside sales team). Would love to work with him always!‚Äù Show less

honors_and_awards.title: Naukri National Sales Yoddha Contest Winner
honors_and_awards.description: "Naukri National Sales Yoddha Contest" is the biggest sales contest in Naukri.com conducted PAN India. - Myself, ranked No. 2 performer PAN India; National level contest, competing with 200+ executives. - Achieved 211% of the given Business Objective for the Quarter. - Winning the title consistently for the second time.

honors_and_awards.title: The New Client Warrior
honors_and_awards.description: More the number of clients your meet, the more you learn, the more you understand their problems, the more you gain knowledge and ultimately the more you sell and generate top-line growth for the company. It was my pleasure meeting most number of new corporates, understanding their problems and suggesting solutions with a cost effective proposition. Thank you one and all for supporting me and win this award.

honors_and_awards.title: The New Product Champion
honors_and_awards.description: Naukri.com has been the most innovate company on online recruitment front. It introduces new products every time to make recruitment easier for corporates. I was awarded the New Product Champion Title for selling these new products to the clients, helping them to have a better recruitment process at cost effective proposition. Thank you everyone for your wholehearted support.

honors_and_awards.title: The most prestigious title: Star Performer
honors_and_awards.description: FY 2014 was very special to me as I have won the most number of awards in a Financial Quarter. Thanks to all my well-wishers, Faculties, Trainers, Bosses, Colleagues and everyone for supporting me and achieve these awards. Star of the Quarter is the most prestigious title, and I have been awarded it the 2nd time in a row. Thank you very much Info Edge India Ltd. for arraigning such good learning platform. Thank you very much and my humble gratitude to all.

honors_and_awards.title: Star Performer Award
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded "Star Performer" for the best performance in Tamil Nadu - Kerala Region Highlights: - 211% Revenue Achievement to the given business objective. - Maximum number of new orders in the region.

honors_and_awards.title: Naukri National Sales Yoddha Contest Winner
honors_and_awards.description: "Naukri National Sales Yoddha Contest" is the biggest sales contest in Naukri.com conducted PAN India. - Achieved 201% of the given Business Target - National level contest, competing with 160+ executives.

honors_and_awards.title: Best Business Plan Award
honors_and_awards.description: Won Best Business Plan Award in CET, Trivandrum in June 2012. The theme to be presented was Social Entrepreneurship on ‚ÄúSustainable Village‚Äù. The Business plan talks about a company, which facilitates production of organic food stuff. The company manages the entire supply chain and reaches the consumers through retail chains. These food products are branded, innovated and provide at value prices.

honors_and_awards.title: Best Paper Presentation, Indus Business Academy, New Delhi
honors_and_awards.description: Won 3rd prize in the Spandan Indus Business Academy, National level paper presentation contest held in Indus Business Academy, New Delhi in January 2012. The topic was ‚ÄúHuman values in corporate life‚Äù. It focused on the importance of reciprocal respect between a company and its employees, each giving their best to the other. Emphasizing that candidates should be hired for their values, he said that the company‚Äôs values should be clearly expressed and well respected. ‚Ä¶ Show more
